moments.title: Hook Opening
moments.description: Strong visual hook but could be tighter. Consider cutting 2 seconds from the opening sequence.

moments.title: Pacing Slow
moments.description: Energy dips here. The transition feels sluggish and could benefit from faster cuts.

moments.title: Strong Engagement
moments.description: Excellent storytelling moment. The visual and audio sync perfectly here.

moments.title: Audio Levels
moments.description: Audio levels drop slightly. Consider boosting by 3dB for consistency.

moments.title: CTA Timing
moments.description: Call-to-action comes too quickly. Add 1 second pause before final message.

editorialNotes.summary: Your hook shows strong potential with compelling visual storytelling, but the pacing could benefit from tighter editing in the first 8 seconds. The narrative arc builds effectively, though some transitions feel rushed around the 15-second mark. Consider extending key moments for better emotional impact while maintaining the overall energy that makes this content engaging.
keyInsights: Add 1s pause before final CTA at 00:28
